SELECT contract_id, customer_id, customer_name, insured_id, insured_name, product_id, product_name, reg_date, expired_date, contract_status, premium_amount, payment_cycle, update_date, admin_idx, admin_name, admin_role FROM ( SELECT c.contract_id, c.customer_id, cu.name AS customer_name, c.insured_id, ins.name AS insured_name, c.product_id, p.productname AS product_name, c.reg_date, c.expired_date, c.contract_status, c.premium_amount, c.payment_cycle, c.update_date, c.admin_idx, ad.admin_name AS admin_name, ad.admin_role AS admin_role, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY c.reg_date DESC, c.contract_id DESC) AS rn FROM shez_contracts c INNER JOIN shez_customers cu ON c.customer_id = cu.customer_id INNER JOIN shez_customers ins ON c.insured_id = ins.customer_id INNER JOIN shez_insurances p ON c.product_id = p.productno LEFT JOIN shez_admins ad ON c.admin_idx = ad.admin_idx
) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{startRow} + 1 AND #{endRow}
